q: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. What am I?
The more of me there is, the less you see. What am I?
I am taken from a mine and shut in a wooden case, yet I am used by almost everyone. What am I?
I have cities but no houses, forests but no trees, and water but no fish. What am I?
I shrink smaller every time I’m used. What am I?
I have a tongue but cannot taste, and eyes but cannot see. What am I?
I am full of holes but can hold water. What am I?
I fly without wings and cry without eyes. What am I?
I go up but never come down. What am I?
I am always in front of you but cannot be seen. What am I?
I have keys but no locks. What am I?
I can be long, short, grown, or bought. What am I?
I am not alive but I grow; I don’t have lungs, but I need air. What am I?
I am always hungry and must be fed. Touch me and I’ll turn red. What am I?
I have hands but cannot hold anything. What am I?
I have a neck but no head, two arms but no hands. What am I?
I disappear every night but return every morning. What am I?
I can run but never walk. What am I?
I can be cracked, told, and played. What am I?
I am long when young and short when old. What am I?
I have teeth but cannot bite. What am I?
I go up and down stairs without moving. What am I?
I have a bed but never sleep. I run but never walk. What am I?
I start with an E, end with an E, but contain only one letter. What am I?
I am invisible, but you can feel and hear me. What am I?
I have a heart but it doesn’t beat. What am I?
I can fill a room but take up no space. What am I?
I can travel around the world while staying in a corner. What am I?
I disappear the moment you speak my name. What am I?
I have eyes but cannot see. What am I?
I have a head and a tail but no body. What am I?
I am invisible yet you can feel me and hear me. What am I?
I am always moving but never leave my place. What am I?
I have a face, but no eyes, mouth, or nose. What am I?
I can be long or short, grown or bought, painted or bare. What am I?
I fly without wings. Darkness flees wherever I go. What am I?
I have a tongue but cannot taste. What am I?
I can be broken but never held. What am I?
I am always hungry and will die if not fed. What am I?
I can be cracked or told, but I am not physical. What am I?
I go all around the world but stay in one corner. What am I?
I can fill a room without taking up space. What am I?
I am always in front of you but cannot be touched. What am I?
I have teeth but I don’t bite. What am I?
I disappear every night but return every morning. What am I?
I have keys but cannot open locks. What am I?
I am long when young, short when old. What am I?
I have a bed but never sleep, I run but never walk. What am I?
I start with an E, end with an E, but contain only one letter. What am I?
I can be long or short, grown or bought, painted or bare. What am I?
I am heavier than air but cannot be touched. What am I?
I can move mountains without effort. What am I?
I am always thirsty yet never drink. What am I?
I go through walls without breaking them. What am I?
I speak in riddles and reveal truth only to the clever. What am I?
I have no voice, yet I tell stories. What am I?
I can swallow anything, but I never eat. What am I?
I am sharp but I cut no flesh. What am I?
I can exist in one place but make everything move. What am I?
I am invisible but can trap you. What am I?
I can break but never fall, and I can fall but never break. What am I?
I am the beginning of the end, and the end of time and space. What am I?
I have one eye but cannot see. What am I?
I move without legs, I roar without a mouth. What am I?
I can be full of water but never wet. What am I?
I can run but never stop, and I can stop but never run. What am I?
I am not alive, but I can die. What am I?
I can fall but never rise, yet I rise when I fall. What am I?
I have no body but I can carry you. What am I?
I am always moving but always stay in place. What am I?
I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?
I am heavy forward, light backward. What am I?
I can fly but I am not alive. What am I?
I can surround you without touching. What am I?
I can be trapped but never held. What am I?
I am always invisible but can leave traces behind. What am I?
I can hide but never leave. What am I?
I am weightless but can make you fall. What am I?
I am everywhere yet nowhere. What am I?
I can burn without fire. What am I?
I am endless but can be measured. What am I?
I exist without being seen and move without walking. What am I?
I can blind without eyes. What am I?
I can speak all languages yet never say a word. What am I?
I can be broken but I am not physical. What am I?
I can be caught but cannot be thrown. What am I?
I am weightless yet can sink a ship. What am I?
I can exist in darkness but vanish in light. What am I?
I can follow you forever but never catch up. What am I?
I can fly across the world but never leave my corner. What am I?
I am invisible, yet can hold everything. What am I?
I have no wings but can soar. What am I?
I can open but have no door. What am I?
I can be cracked but never touched. What am I?
I can exist in any shape but have no body. What am I?
I can run forever yet have no legs. What am I?
I can be captured but not contained. What am I?
I can create worlds yet exist nowhere. What am I?
I am always moving yet I leave no mark. What am I?
I am eternal yet can be broken. What am I?
I can be invisible yet can kill. What am I?
I am everywhere and nowhere at the same time. What am I?
I can twist reality but I am not alive. What am I?
I can trap light but have no form. What am I?
I can exist in multiple places but am not material. What am I?
I am always moving forward yet never change. What am I?
I can make you blind yet have no eyes. What am I?
I can rise without wings. What am I?
I can fall without moving. What am I?
I can trap everything yet contain nothing. What am I?
I am endless but can be paused. What am I?
I can echo without speaking. What am I?
I can reflect without a mirror. What am I?
I exist without being seen, and I vanish when you look for me. What am I?
I can be in the past, present, and future at once. What am I?
I am weightless yet can crush mountains. What am I?
I can move mountains but cannot be touched. What am I?
I can fly through walls but leave no trace. What am I?
I can make everything silent. What am I?
I can twist minds but I am not alive. What am I?
I am everywhere and nowhere, constant yet fleeting. What am I?
I can rise higher than mountains yet weigh nothing. What am I?
I can bend reality yet have no hands. What am I?
I can be broken by telling the truth. What am I?
I can vanish but leave a mark. What am I?
I can travel without moving. What am I?
I can burn without fire and freeze without ice. What am I?
I can hold everything yet hold nothing. What am I?
I can exist without matter. What am I?
I am endless and yet finite. What am I?
I can twist time but never move. What am I?
I can split but remain whole. What am I?
I can hold the world yet weigh nothing. What am I?
I can blind the eye without touching. What am I?
I can make you see the impossible. What am I?
I can exist in two places at once without moving. What am I?
I can create universes yet exist nowhere. What am I?
I can move without being alive. What am I?
I am everywhere and nowhere, felt yet unseen. What am I?
I can destroy without touching. What am I?
I can bend light but am not alive. What am I?
I can fold space yet have no hands. What am I?
I can reflect the world without being real. What am I?
I can stretch forever yet have limits. What am I?
I can vanish but exist forever. What am I?
I can exist without beginning or end. What am I?
I can bend but never break. What am I?
I can split atoms without moving. What am I?
I can move through anything but touch nothing. What am I?
I can change everything without touching. What am I?
